amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to strike funding for the McGovern-Dole International Food for Education and Child Nutrition Program and directs the total to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the McGovern-Dole International Food for Education and Child Nutrition Program by $240,000,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 350 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 350 (Roll no. 415).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
